George Orwell (1903-1950), British novelist, author of Animal Farm 動物農場|动物农场 and 1984

sentences.english: What will you see in the Orwell diaries?
sentences.chinese: 从奥威尔的日记里，我们能看到什么？

sentences.english: He resigned in 1927 and decided to become a writer.
sentences.chinese: 1927年，奥威尔辞去职务，决意成为一名作家。

sentences.english: Orwell praised Waugh publicly for his moral courage.
sentences.chinese: 奥威尔曾公开赞扬沃夫的道德勇气。

sentences.english: What was it that Orwell said?
sentences.chinese: 奥威尔说这句话是什么意思？

sentences.english: Why should we pay the Orwellian licence fee?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么要支付奥威尔的牌照费？
可这就是奥威尔双重标准。

sentences.english: Orwell was thus brought up in an atmosphere of impoverished snobbery.
sentences.chinese: 奥威尔在穷酸的氛围中被带大。

sentences.english: Initially, Astor offered it to Orwell for a holiday.
sentences.chinese: 起初，阿斯特建议奥威尔到这里度假。
1945年，奥威尔的《动物农场》付梓出版。
